name: Wander, the path of trust
description:
In Wander, you play as a blind man who perceives his environment through sound waves. The safety of the path he follows relies on his relationship with a strange creature who guides him.

Wander is a game developed by a team of students from ENJMIN (French National School of Games and Interactive Media).

The first version of the game was released in June 2013 for the Hits Playtime (a french game dev contest), and won the 1st prize.

A second, longer and (slightly) less buggy version was developed in six more months to enter the IGF, and was released on December 2013.
